pullrequest.title: Implemented SimbodyPhysics::SetParam and slimmed down physics engines

content.raw: Yeah, I originally did this partially to preserve the original code I was replacing, where most of the time a value is casted as an int then as an unsigned int if that fails, but sometimes it's only casted as an int. It appears that it's safe to assume that an integer value physics parameter is also an unsigned integer, however...?
content.html: Yeah, I originally did this partially to preserve the original code I was replacing, where most of the time a value is casted as an int then as an unsigned int if that fails, but sometimes it's only casted as an int. It appears that it's safe to assume that an integer value physics parameter is also an unsigned integer, however...?
